name: CITADEL
intro: A dystopian post-human war game built on the blockchain
introduce: CITADEL is a dystopian post-human war game built on the blockchain where CITADEL are minted, controlled, and sieged in a game of survival, destruction, and conquest.  All assets and actions in the game will be fully on-chain. All rulesets of the game will be on-chain. All outcomes of the game will be decided on-chain.
